name: Retro'Clock
description:
RETRO O'CLOCK is a game that invites you on a journey through time among the games of our childhood, games that once kept us for hours in front of the screens. If any of these presented games finds you old passions, I recommend you to replay it in its official version and on the platform on which it was published.
An exact reproduction of the games was not intended, each game is reinterpreted according to the vision of the developers.
The game was created for the FiiCode GameJam 2020.
